example.parse: (S (PUNC ") (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يمكن) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يكون) (NP-3 (DET+NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_NOM البعض)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تصور) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (S (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_ACC القصة)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM بسيطة))) (PUNC ,)

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on taSaw~ar
